summary: REQ-1 is implemented in WorkoutPlanView.tsx. The 'Your Workout Plan' banner section now has a green gradient overlay applied via an absolutely-positioned div over the banner image using Tailwind classes from-green-700/90 via-green-600/70 to-green-500/40. The heading text is white with drop-shadow for legibility. The change is isolated to WorkoutPlanView.tsx and does not affect other views.
